movie_title: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
title: Really funny.
review: Very very funny movie. You will laugh till the end. Has some vulgar scenes. And maybe offensive to some viewers but a very good movie.

movie_title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
title: Best romance
review: A beautiful movie with very good acting. You really have to think about it to get the timeline. But once you do you will feel like falling in love.
